title: Too many problems.
text: Vinted works until there are problems with the sales. For example, people too often send the wrong sizes. Vinted gives you little time to return before they finalize the sales. Middle of the week, not exception. They expect you to leave work and ship products back while paying for shipping. Time to look for a better alternative

title: There Are MUCH Better Options Than Vinted
text:
There are way better options. This app is full of authoritarians and one little wrong move and you‚Äôll be in trouble. I had an old listing that wasn‚Äôt moving so I uploaded the item again with better pictures and I got reprimanded. No other app restrains you like this.
If they suspect your photos are stock images you‚Äôll have your item deleted, even if they‚Äôre your own photos, and contacting them is pointless.
You have to sell for dirt cheap just to move anything, people don‚Äôt even want to buy a shirt for $1

Try elsewhere

title: Terrible customer support
text: I can‚Äôt add a new card and get an error that the card authorization failed every time. It also ‚Äúrefused‚Äù to run the debit card I did have on file even though there was plenty of money on it. After a few attempts, my bank put a block on my card for potential fraud. I reached out to customer support and they said I had to take it up with my bank. It‚Äôs not my bank, I‚Äôve looked into this. It is an error with the payment provider they are using. This has happened to me many times over the years and they‚Äôre never willing to acknowledge or do anything about it.

title: $0.99 shipping needs to come back!
text: This app is all about affordable clothes. Now that the lower shipping prices promo has ended I think it‚Äôs going to be cause for less sales. I already had a buyer inquire about what happened to the shipping cost and why it‚Äôs now $3.99 instead of $0.99 for small shipping. I think this shipping cost change is going to hinder most buyers AND sellers. Please bring $0.99 shipping back!!

title: Used to be great!!
text:
Back during summer of 2022 items were anywhere as cheap as a dollar for shipping costs: $3.99 (small), $4.99 (medium), $5.99+ large. The app made the minimum shipping cost $5.99 no matter the item now. They claimed to changed these costs due to the postal service costs, but that‚Äôs just not true. 

I‚Äôve also had to contact support MANY times with no help. They even banned my account at some point??? It was a great way to buy items and make a bit of cash before, but now don‚Äôt waste your time. The creators just ruined the experience completely by having horrible service and dishonest with costs.

title: they think they‚Äôre slick
text:
WASTE OF TIME IF YOURE AN AVID THRIFTER OR A REAL PART OF THE SECONDHAND COMMUNITY. 

I was really enjoying Vinted and the ease of use until about 5 minutes ago when I got a message saying that a big chunk of my closet was removed due to the fact that I thrifted them. Crazy, right? On an app named after vintage clothing!
The description in the app store says ‚Äúbe part of the movement making secondhand first choice‚Äù but threatened to ban me for curating a collection of secondhand goods? 
‚ÄúVinted is the go-to app for everything secondhand‚Äù and yet youre literally not allowed to spread secondhand on here lol. 

I ignored all the other reviews complaining bc I know some people are unhappy no matter what, but nope. 

With all the shipping discounts and the 0% fees AND them asking for a lot of very sensitive personal info and having such insane rules, I genuinely feel like this platform is a trap to steal peoples information. No app who is actually trying to ‚Äúbe a part of the secondhand movement‚Äù would flag people so excessively.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time
text: After selling on here for some time, I get a notice I‚Äôm blocked for selling counterfeit items. Didn‚Äôt know people faked Walmart brands but okay. So I reach out to them and ask for an explanation. I have all 5 star reviews. No issues on any platform I sell on. Yet they ‚Äúdiscovered‚Äù I‚Äôm selling fakes. The last time they tried to block my account it was because I was trying to make money according to them. Well okay. Isn‚Äôt that what we are there for?? Don‚Äôt waste your time or effort selling here. I‚Äôm sure once you hit a certain dollar amount, they start looking for reasons to block you. Waste of time!!

title: Scam
text: I have been selling on Vinted for over two years when they moved over to there new platform it‚Äôs been nothing but issues all my sales have not been delivered buyers have reported not receiving orders even after confirmation from post office Vinted just cancels the order and refunds the buyer but not me not only am I out of the money but also my items do frustrated they don‚Äôt even reply to messages just send automated messages that‚Äôs aren‚Äôt helpful ! Vinted has definitely turn scammy also now asking for a social security to get paid when no other apps do ! Will definitely stop using and deleting this app !

title: Skip this one!
text: If you‚Äôre trying to sell your stuff, you‚Äôll want to pass on this one! This site is painful to use and is a complete waste of time. If you have the patience to actually get some listings up, they will likely be deleted by their site trolls with a ‚Äúlist‚Äù of reasons that don‚Äôt even apply to you or your listings. Just a generic response. Unfortunately, there is no fix because their customer service is nonexistent and they‚Äôve made it impossible to contact them. If you want to sell your stuff a legit site download Posh and Merc instead. This one likely won‚Äôt last long.

title: So simple to use!
text:
I‚Äôve never written a review before but this app is just so wonderful. Considering it‚Äôs my first time ever selling things, Vinted was so easy to understand and maneuver around. 
I will say though‚Äî there is no customer service, just a bunch of redirected links. However, there isn‚Äôt much to have a problem to begin with so I don‚Äôt think customer service is ever needed.

title: Leaving all other apps for this one
text: I love this app!!!!!! For both buying and selling, I came from other apps like Poshmark and Mercari and for buying and selling this is the MOST reasonable one! I love offering my buyers a good deal and this app doesn‚Äôt take fees, the shipping is also the most reasonable rate of ALL the apps I have bought and sold on. Also customer service is absolutely wonderful!

title: Horrible horrible horrible!
text: I was excited to use Vinted to sell a few things, but my first experience was horrible.  I listed many items and then was immediately blocked and informed that my account is blocked because I listed counterfeit items.  I absolutely did not!!  All items were authentic.  Then there was terrible customer service as you can only app with a chatbot and I kept getting the same standard responses with no way to clear up the matter.  They wanted receipts for something that‚Äôs 6 years old, yeah right!  Save yourself the headaches and false accusations and use eBay or a different app.

title: They block my account for no reason
text: So it been a few weeks since i didn‚Äôt check my account, so I went to see what‚Äôs new and they block my account for sell ‚Äúfake prestige brands‚Äù which I only had I coach wallet which was original and it was with the tag and everything Also they say bc it was more than 20 items that ‚Äúit was fake‚Äù but the other 19 items was a no even reconditioned brands. They delate some shoes, clothes, makeup, heals etc. also they say I have differents accounts and I only have ‚Äúhad‚Äù 1 they send me a long text explaining which non made sense! Whatever bye vinted

title: No way to contact help centre/ user support
text:
My account was blocked after placing my first purchase on making my account. I have no way to ‚Äúverify my purchase‚Äù as I was asked to, because my account was blocked, and now nothing will go through.

Hopefully I will get my money back if being blocked makes it so that I won‚Äôt receive my order, as I have no way to contact the seller, or any sort of customer service. 

The app offers no assistance in their help centre, and the website is unresponsive to trying to submit an issue report.

title: Shipping Is Ridiculous
text: I have had this app for a few years now. Initially, I absolutely LOVED it and bought most of my kids clothes and my clothes on here. Recently I have found that even if I find a good price on the clothes, the shipping is at least $8 on everything. This is mostly a platform to sell already used items. I refuse to spend just about the same amount for it used, as I would be buying it brand new. Especially when most of the cost is due to shipping. It‚Äôs been awhile since I‚Äôve even purchased anything on here and may soon delete the app entirely.

title: Amazing purchase!!
text: Nikki is the Sweetest! She sent my order out and I received my Awesome tooled leather fish belt and Van jeans super fast! I live in the Ozarks and that is an accomplishment in itself! The packaging was super pretty with a hand written thank you card and a special little surprise tea!! This seller goes above and beyond‚Ä¶ I highly recommend, and will be sharing and buying again from her closet/store!!! Thank you So much!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Love it!
text: I started selling on Vinted in 2015 but got busy and phased out of it. I started again a couple months ago and it‚Äôs still amazing!! I‚Äôm not a stay at home mom so it‚Äôs a nice way to get rid of clothes that no longer fit and make some extra money. Plus I‚Äôve found so many cute clothes and accessories that many I wouldn‚Äôt be able to find anywhere else!

title: Need to fix shipping issues
text: I want to give 5 stars for this app. I lost so many orders due to shipping glitches on there end. They take the customers money and hold it and never issue a shipping lable.  When you open a case they just tell you to wait a few day. A few days pass still no shipping lable. Then they tell me cancel the order and have customer repurchase the item. By then the customers over the waiting game and the site holding there money and never end up repurchasing. It have been going on for months. I don‚Äôt even purchase items off this site anymore.

title: 0 stars
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Started using Vinted around May if this year. Through the summer it was wonderful, easy to use and make sales. However, in the past month or so it has become basically an inconvenience. 1/2 of the listings I made get either deleted by Vinted or edited by Vinted. They claim ‚Äúbrand name issue‚Äù when the brand name I have selected in the listing is very clearly the brand name all over the piece of clothing. AND THEN they accused me of listing counterfeit goods! Sorry but no one has time to mess around with counterfeit Hollister T-shirts üòÇ As soon as my earnings are released I will be closing my account

title: Good app, needs LANGUAGE in the book section or it‚Äôs impossible to find anything!
text:
I am really enjoying this app! When you buy you have some great filters including colours!
However, the huge book section could sell SO MUCH BETTER, if the developers add one simple filter - language in which the book is written!! It has every genre imaginable, but no language!
So at the moment you scroll and scroll forever in any section and there are SO many books in all languages! 
Guys, let‚Äôs fix that! It will be great for both sellers and buyers!

title: Remove inactive sellers.
text: Like Vinted, really taking advantage of the low shipping prices right now, wish it was permanent. The only cons are the inactive sellers. Wish Vinted would removed sellers after being offline for so long. I hate making purchases and having them refunded because the seller is MIA for months and even years; just deactivate. Also, wish I could leave feedback on sellers without making a pursues based on conversation.

title: Shipping fees are phenomenal
text: With increases in shipping and seller fees on other selling platforms, Vinted is the savior for the reseller AND the buyer! While shipping is stated to be for a promo period, it has been extended several times. Buyers don‚Äôt mind paying .99 on a 1 lb item compared to over $6 on other sites. If this business can continue to grow its user base and selling categories, it could easily overtake the reselling world!

title: They love to auto-delete your posts
text: Wanted to love this app, but it‚Äôs really restrictive. I feel as though more of my ads have been auto-deleted (with vague reasons!) than have been allowed to stay on the platform. They really only want you to sell clothes. The other categories are a joke because they‚Äôll find some reason to delete your posts. There needs to be more transparency with this app; they need to be more upfront and clear with sellers as to what is allowed and what is not allowed, and why! There are much better apps out there that truly allow you to decutter your house.

title: I like Vinted But‚Ä¶
text:
They need to open up more categories to sell items. Some items I‚Äôm not able to sell because they don‚Äôt have a category for it
Also wish there was an easier way to find the ones who liked my items. Searching through the notifications is time consuming

Please help fix this so I can start using your wonderful app again ;(!

title: Bad customer support
text: An item I purchased got lost‚Ä¶ due to the carriers fault. So I reached out to the carrier directly as well as to Vinted. And Vinted just dropped the case‚Ä¶ both the seller and myself have for over one week reached out to them and asked for help. Their response: we can‚Äôt help-this our final response üò≥üò°. And than they stopped communicating completely. I kept writing if anyone heard back from the carrier, if anyone could help? Nothing‚Ä¶ I used to love LOVE shopping there, now not so much. If something goes south, there‚Äôs a chance they will leave you hanging. I‚Äôm very disappointed.

title: Amazing bundle of item
text:
Decided I wanted to buy something for my self and this closet of items was filled with differing items I liked. The bundle was great price and I am thankful for how fast it came. There was thoughtfulness and care in wrapping and packaging and I just truly feel blessed. 
If I‚Äôm looking for something I‚Äôll always check back. Great find and great customer service.

title: Horrible for Sellers
text: Everyone wants yard sale prices, not considering the time and packaging expenses of packing and shipping (have they seen rising costs of everything?). Absolutely ZERO seller protection, if tracking on an item doesn‚Äôt update, even though it was marked as shipped, then expect to be out the money and item because Vinted Support will just tell you you‚Äôre out of luck and it‚Äôll Auto-Cancel. I don‚Äôt understand why it isn‚Äôt a timeframe, then the buyer can choose to cancel like ALL other platforms. I‚Äôd rather pay a small fee (or even substantial like Poshmark) to have SOME sort of seller protection!

title: Amazing seller.
text: I bought 2 things from this seller and they both came in less than a week which i am thankful for. Seller was very nice and even let me by the items for a cheaper amount than the regular price. Def would buy from them again I loved everything that i bought from them ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Vinted needs to do better
text: Not a fan of how they don‚Äôt let users post screenshots from websites of the item they‚Äôre selling. There are times where my camera doesn‚Äôt do a good job of depicting how the clothing looks on me, so I‚Äôll post a screenshot of the model wearing it on my other selling apps. However, on Vinted, if you do this, they‚Äôll delete your post. It also extremely hard for the items I‚Äôm selling to be sold without bumping and bumping costs money. Let‚Äôs us be able to promote items for free and post screenshots. Or at least make it easier for shoppers to find items.

title: Deletes listing for vague reasons.
text: They deleted my listings constantly for vague reasons from ‚Äúprohibited products‚Äù to ‚Äúcounterfeit‚Äù. These are all their mistakes and they don‚Äôt give you the option to easily appeal. Their automation makes too many mistakes which in turn, makes this app undesirable and a serious waste of time. If they ban you for unknown reasons, then they take your personal info and bank account you use for payouts into their data while you have no access to it. Very unreliable and shady. Very strict compared to other marketplaces and anything you do can be a listen.

title: Not good like it used to be
text: I used to use this app and sold things everyday!  Ever since they switched to no sellers fees, it switched to no sales at all!! The only way you Al can attempt to make money is to PAY to bump your sales.  Also, literally every time you tap on this app, you can‚Äôt proceed until you update it and when I say that could be 1-2 times a week or more, not kidding! It‚Äôs completely ridiculous.  I went from making $500+ a month on this app to $0 in over 2 years!! Go to Mercari or Poshmark!! Or even Kidizen.  I wouldn‚Äôt waste your time here guys ‚úåüèª

title: Ripped off both mom and i
text: Me and my mom were enjoying this app until we both got blocked for suspicious activity. The only suspicious activity was coming from this app. They would take out money 3x from your account after buying one item and then give you the money back. Which yes they do give your money back but then you are blocked and they never read any emails from you. Both me and my mom contacted them to prove we didn‚Äôt do anything and never heard back and are still blocked. Loved this app until they pulled this. Very disappointed.

title: Received purchase
text:
This jacket was in excellent condition, I feel it was actually under priced as this looks to have never been worn/ used. I‚Äôd most definitely recommend buying from this seller again. I‚Äôm extremely pleased because I buy alot of these jackets to work in and I love matching them with my scrubs. 
Thank you Kiley, 
Sincerely, 
Anna Elizabeth ( Beth )

title: 0 Support
text: I have been using Vinted for years and never had an issue or a bad review. Today I received a notification that there is a discount on shipping for small orders and when I went to log into the app my account was randomly deleted. I would of NEVER deleted the account with a balance!!! I submitted a request for help and received an automated message that doesn‚Äôt give me ability to select the ‚Äú"No, I still need help" button below‚Äù. I‚Äôm lost and upset that an app this big who doesn‚Äôt skip a beat to take their cut, can‚Äôt support the Sellers / Buyers who support you.

title: Needs work
text: I used to purchase items on this form until they blocked my credit card for no reason. It was a hassle to get it resolved through my bank because of Vinted‚Äôs app. To make matters worse once I fixed the problem they caused with my bank they couldn‚Äôt fix the problem on their end!  I was already turned off by all of the scammers and fake listings but this incident pushed me over the limit. I‚Äôm sticking with Grailed and Vestiaire Collective for my online consignment shopping needs.

title: says my name ‚Äúisn‚Äôt real‚Äù
text: How am I supposed to use this app if it tells me my own name isn‚Äôt real?? I know this is a problem you guys haven‚Äôt fixed because I searched online and other users are having the and issue. I tried many different combinations of my name and this is really an issue because I would rather write a review on how the app is but I can‚Äôt even because it won‚Äôt let me sign up. I‚Äôm looking for alternatives to overpriced sellers on depop or grailed because I‚Äôm not always looking for designer or whatever but this app needs to do better for real.

title: Please Bring Back .99 Shipping
text: The biggest reason I used this app was for the .99 shipping. Small packages are now 3.99 shipping, which is still a lot better than Poshmark, but I have a real opposition to paying more for shipping than I am for the actual purchase. So my $1-4 purchases aren‚Äôt really that great of a deal anymore. I‚Äôll probably continue to use the app for $8-15 purchases, but I used to purchase so many smaller items before the change.

title: Great Seller and great communication
text: This was my first purchase using Vinted and I am so happy! Everything worked out so easily. I also want to thank der_graf_von_h for his great communication with me and direct photo of the shipping label. I am new here and will be back. Thank you again so much! The product I received was in great condition and exactly as described. Top!

title: IP is used to create profile during initial installation
text: The app is using IP to configure user profile and gives access only to local futures assigned based by your location. The function to change your country location and monetary currency is disabled or not allowed. It seems like the app is available worldwide therefore why users have those limitations? In the event if a person creates profile under VPN the app is mistakenly assigning their location without option to correct it. Not well thought functions and limitations. I suggest eBay instead.

title: 1 year of Consistency
text:
After a year of listing daily, growing my inventory, branding myself, etc. I can truly say, that Vinted has allowed me to be a stay at home parent. 
I quite my 39hr a week job at a Domestic Violence Shelter that was breaking me physically and mentally and now I am my own BOSS with no salary to limit my income! 
I will make as much money as the effort I put in, THE SKY IS THE LIMIT. ü™Ç

title: No customer support
text: I‚Äôve been a user of this app for a while now and this is the first experience I‚Äôve had where I could not find or locate a proper contact for customer service representative. I have a shipped a package over a month ago. I got a notification that the package has been delivered. However the tracking that has been provided by the app shows that the package has still not arrived to its destination. It‚Äôs been saying that the package will arrive late and that status has not changed but on the app the package has arrived.

title: They will never solve issues
text: Customer support is almost non existent and you finally are able to contact them they do 0 to help. For example I contact to say: You are not accepting my card that has always worked and I don‚Äôt own alternative payment methods. Their response: Sorry, we can‚Äôt accept your card, please try an alternative payment method. DID YOU EVEN READ MY MESSAGE?? So frustrating - I am sure the buyer fee and postage (which is suspiciously overinflated) goes to them however when it‚Äôs their turn to do their job they do NOTHING.

title: Confused and scammed
text: I‚Äôm not the type to leave a review or complain about little things but Bought a pair of shoes seller the whole time was comparing price to new pairs and I have no problem buying pre owned if they price is right but when I got these in Wowwwww major MAJOR scuffs on both sides like over a inch of paint removed from them rubbing looked back at the pictures and HOWWW ironic no pics of the side with the flaws I‚Äôve had no problems on here before but this is my last HELP CENTER SAID IT WAS DESCRIBED BC THE SHOES SAID USED YEAAA OK honestly think he posted n kept wearing too just from the general condo

title: Very happy customer!
text: I was thrilled when seller accepted my offer for this shirt and even more so when it arrived a few days later. She even took the time to wrap it like a present and there were a few stickers as a bonus! Shirt was even better in person and fit exactly as described! Thank you!

I‚Äôve downloaded Vinted because a costumer from France wanted to buy a cosplay piece from me and I am in the United States. She recommended Vinted to me and today I finally got time to upload the pictures and took some time to edit my profile and the description of the piece. Right after I finished and was about to send the costumer the link, I suddenly got blocked and banned from Vinted because they claim that I am selling ‚Äúillegal or unauthentic clothings‚Äù like what????? How is cosplay costume with my own picture and the sizings turned into illegal clothings? What is wrong with this app?

title: Used to be a good place to sell. Not anymore.
text: I‚Äôve used Vinted to sell my new and preloved clothing and accessories for years, until now. They randomly deleted 16 of my 23 items, because I ‚Äúviolated‚Äù their terms and conditions. The items have been present for months and some longer than a year. It seems they are changing their terms and not warning anyone. They removed so many photos and item descriptions that I spent time making. So I won‚Äôt be selling anything else here.

title: Rude Customer Service
text: If they feel something is not ‚Äúauthentic,‚Äù they hide your listing and will make you provide more pictures to them to prove it‚Äôs real. Evidently, they have a catalog they pull from to see if your item is fake. Well they told me my AUTHENTIC earrings have been pulled from this catalog which I bought personally from Carson‚Äòs. They went on to berate me that I will be blocked from using the app if I do this again. Then they told me to have a great day. I have given them a lot of money through both buying and selling over the years.
